item.description:
Spring is the time to take the leap to healthier eating habits! Let us make it simple & fun for oyu! join us for this three week introduction to living foods, their benefits, time-saving tips and demos on easy ways to get started preparing your own raw food! Food tastings given throughout the evening.

Three week series: April 1, 8 & 15 from 7-9pm $99 deal!

To register email Imani@thegreenvibration.com

For a kick start - try our 5 day juice fast challenge to detoxify and eliminate dis-ease! Follow up with our class to support you during your transition to a more vibrant Y-O-U! Weekly produce & raw food grocery delivery also available for all participants.

We make it easy for you to eat well!
item.name: Raw Food Basics with John & Imani
